name: test_entry
nl_statement: \begin{theorem} Let $(X,\mathcal{T})$ be a Hausdorff topological space. Define $X' := X\cup\{\infty\}$ and \[ \mathcal{T}' \;:=\; \mathcal{T}\;\cup\;\bigl\{(X\setminus K)\cup\{\infty\} \;:\; K\subseteq X \text{ is compact}\bigr\}.\] Show that $\mathcal{T}'$ is a topology on $X'$.\end{theorem}
